source: if Input.match('contains', 'One|one|Uno|uno|1', Context.get('currentMessage'), {}) then Workflow.branch(139) end
if Input.match('contains', 'Two|two|Dos|dos|2', Context.get('currentMessage'), {}) then Workflow.branch(140) end
if Input.match('contains', 'Three|three|Tres|tres|3', Context.get('currentMessage'), {}) then Workflow.branch(141) end

-- Save user input as a question to be answered in the FAQs Flow
Context.set("user-question", Context.get("currentMessage"))

Workflow.branch(138)
